Name: My Cashy Side Job at Lost&Found in the Subway of Million-Person City
About the game: A short but eventful visual novel that will immerse you in the indescribable atmosphere of Russian reality. An ordinary russian school leaver Alexander gets summer side job as storekeeper in subway's lost and found. His dream is to earn money before university to buy a gaming laptop exclusively for study purposes. But is this job as easy as he imagines it? You'll see: - Ruthless and indifferent bureaucratic machine and protagonist's fight against it. - A detective investigation into the return of a lost notebook to a mysterious stranger. - A peek to the dark and death-breathing side of the subway in a noir adventure. Features: - Branched plot where each choice affects the ending - Character design by the artist of 'Everlasting Summer' - Original soundtrack
